name: PolyBots
description:
This is my first ever Multiplayer Unity project built with Photon Pun 2, it is a FFA FPS with a neon futuristic theme. I hope you enjoy this little demo and if you wish to look more into the networking solution I used then below is the link to it on the Unity Asset Store

 https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/network/pun-2-free-119922#publisher

---- CONTROLS ----

WASD - movement

SPACE - jump

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - shoot

ESC - pause
